name: PURE Property Management of Washington

reviews.author: Tru Aging Solutions Marketing
reviews.review: My hot water quit working on Sunday. I was appreciative of the timely response end of the recognition of my experience in the h vac industry. As to the recommendations to replace the water heater. It was done quickly and efficiently and timely.

reviews.author: River Kley
reviews.review: I appreciate the timely and efficient work order process! The manager, Barbara Flores Reta made the process of getting my dryer fixed quick and easy and allowed me to resume laundry in no time! Thank you to the Pure Property Management for resolving my issues so quickly!

reviews.author: Larry Lindborg
reviews.review: I want to compliment Barbara on her great help with my rental maintenance in Ferndale  she was very attentive responsive  informative and prompt  it was nice working with someone that is professional and personal  so many businesses are not

reviews.author: Space Cowboy
reviews.review: One of the worse companies Ive ever had the displeasure to be involved with. Taking over from the last company, they have done the impressive task of making Son-Rise a proactive business. Issues ranging from toilet not flushing, constant

reviews.author: Aaron Schardein
reviews.review: Why would you have showings with boxes you don't have access to now I wasted an hour of my time and there is no solution till Monday maybe only allow showing when someone on staff can oversee operations machines can only do so much.

reviews.author: lisa r
reviews.review: From the moment we entered the Son-Rise office in July 2022, we had excellent service. They were easy to work with during the application process and available to answer all our questions and concerns.  Last week there was an issue with the

ownerResponse.text: Hi Lisa:  Wow! Thank you for giving us a 5-star review. We appreciate your time and effort in letting us know that you are happy with our service. All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

reviews.author: Tabitha Cox
reviews.review: Son-Rise has been flexible, easy to work with, and understanding. We just signed our third lease with them, and though we've only paid rent late once, they were understanding and empathetic during that hard time. They have a very balanced

ownerResponse.text:
Dear Tabitha,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with  More

reviews.author: Darren Bell
reviews.review:
Very responsive and professional. Barbara Reta was a pleasure to work with when we were sorting things out.
Very impressive. I would highly recommend this service

reviews.author: Rick Blair
reviews.review: Great service, work with Barbara Flores regularly and she gets work orders approved and the job complete!

reviews.author: Gina Aiello
reviews.review: Maintenance issues resolved quickly. Barbara Flores Reta was a pleasure to work with, professional and timely.

reviews.author: Julie Oldham
reviews.review: Service was excellent. Response time was very good. The job got quickly was very satisfied  the service.

reviews.author: erich cosgrove
reviews.review: Team is very pleasant to work with and always quick to respond to our requests.  They treat our property as if it were their own, as well as take care of all tenant issues with efficiency and pride.  Excellent management company.  Would recommend to any property owner.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Erich: Thank you very much for the 5* review!  We really appreciate owners like you who are prompt in responding to tenant issues. All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

reviews.review: Kandis, with Son Rise has been very helpful with our transition from one rental we've had for years to the next, that is about to be our place!  She worked with us, which we really appreciate.  Knowing it's a hard time of year to move, they

ownerResponse.text: Hello Adam and Shandra: Thank you for taking the time to send us a 4-star review!  We really appreciate your feedback and look forward to working with you in the coming years.  All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

reviews.author: javier felix
reviews.review: Submitted application for Rental property, 2 weeks later told property already has approval application. My application was never looked at, now they wont refund fee. Scammers,  dont apply! Asked to created pet profile for another $25

reviews.review: I spoke with Jennifer with Son-rise earlier today and I greatly appreciated her time and assistance. She was kind, professional, and extremely helpful as she went above and beyond to help answer my questions. While I unfortunately will most

ownerResponse.text: Hello Jennifer! Thank you for your 5 star review.  We really appreciate your feedback and agree that Jennifer provides awesome customer service.  She certainly does go "above and beyond"!  All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

reviews.review: This was the third management company for my apartment after the property sold, so my experience doesn't encompass beginning or ending a lease with them yet.

reviews.review: Janet went out of her way for a lot of things.  Because we spent 15 hours cleaning, we received our deposit back.

reviews.review: I have had nothing but positive experiences with Son-Rise. The leasing agent who handles the property I'm in is very responsive and typically gets things in my condo fixed within a couple of days. She is very professional and treats me with respect.  I am a very happy "customer".

It's fantastic to know that you had a positive experience and we hope to see you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc..

reviews.review: I have been renting here for one year and I loved it so far. The initial application process was very quick (one week top I think). The manager and their staff really care about our needs and are very understanding. Maintenance is very

reviews.review: These property managers do not care for their tenants. They did not inform me of mold issues before I moved in, I reported mold issues many times after this. Mold built up in the bedroom closet and window sill, ruining some of my cloths.

ownerResponse.text: Dear Nicholas: Thank you for taking the time to let us know your concerns.  Our files indicate that there no mold found during your move out process nor were you assessed any clean up charges for mold.  Please call our office if you would  More

reviews.review: Son Rise Property Management is an incredible company comprised of caring, considerate, and professional property managers and staff. I highly recommend working with them when your real estate asset needs professional management. I have

reviews.review: I'm tempted to join the board of my condo association with the express concern being to find new property management. The reception is rude 90% of the time. There is only one person in the whole office that can do anything associated with

reviews.author: Grant Rich
reviews.review: We have been renting with Son Rise for a year in a 650 sq ft apartment. We always paid our rent on time, never smoked or had pets or had any strange drug party's like just about everyone else in the surrounding areas did.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Grant. Thank you for your feedback. We aim to provide an exceptional experience for all of our customers and would be glad to discuss this further offline. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to let us know how we can do better.

reviews.author: Alison Roll
reviews.review: My father in-law was just injured due to son rise refusing to move a vehicle blocking safe and reasonable access to his unit. This vehicle came from another building and street, yet they refused.

ownerResponse.text: Our team wants to extend our sincerest apologies concerning the issues that you have faced. We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest quality standards for our customers we hope you will give us an opportunity to discuss your concerns further with you. You can reach out to us at (360) 738-3700. We hope to find a solution promptly.

reviews.author: T Nicole
reviews.review: Rented through them for almost three years with no problems. They are quick to fix issues and since we didn't do any damage and left the place clean, we got our full deposit back. Only problem was them raising the rent really high, but that's Bellingham for you.

ownerResponse.text: Hello and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc. and what we offer. Thank you and have a wonderful day!

reviews.author: Edwina Gomez
reviews.review: Do Not Live At Their Properties!! I have lived all around the country and have never had more complications then with Son Rise, they never did half the things that I asked for. Such as fixing a burner on the stove top, even after I showed management when they visited the house. Be careful!!

ownerResponse.text: Good Afternoon Edwina, I am sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience and anyone at our office would be happy to discuss it with you offline. Here at Son-Rise Property Management we really try to make sure that all of our tenants needs are met. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.author: Evan Rhodes
reviews.review: They lied to me about cleaning my unit after handing me the keys. There were disgusting, crusty stains all over the carpet, smoke damage on the walls, and a disgusting smell coming from my bathroom. I even paid for my own carpet cleaner to finish the mandatory task that they failed to achieve.

reviews.review:
Pretty awful experience.

They towed and impounded my car that was registered on my lease and parked next

reviews.author: Pure 149 Design
reviews.review: They manage  my property for 7 years, suddenly they changed the person in charge of my account, and I got a letter saying that I needed to spend $ 6,000.00 in repairs, and had 2 weeks to approved them or they will not represent me anymore.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (360) 738-3700 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

reviews.author: April Gassman
reviews.review: This is a horibble company and the BBB needs to be called. They treated former neighbors horribly. Charged for cleaning that never happened (I live next door I saw how long the cleaners were there) and claimed the house was a mess when I

ownerResponse.text: Hi there April,  I am sorry that you feel we charged your friend unfairly.  Here at Son-Rise Property Management we outsource our vendors to keep move-out cleaning and repairs as transparent as possible, and only remove what we were charged  More

reviews.author: Jordan
reviews.review: called in and asked for the owner because my uncle is a private investor looking for a prop management company.... the receptionist said "FOR WHAT WE HAVE LOTS OF THEM" with the worse attitude and disrespect you could ever encounter. Her

reviews.author: Lucas Robinson
reviews.review: Only rental company I can say I've had all positive experiences with. Extended my lease and cleaned out my new apartment days early so that I wouldn't have to couch surf between. Always nice and honest about expectations

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Lucas,
Thank you so much for your review.  Here at Son-Rise we strive to exceed expectations of our tenants and owners.

reviews.author: Amanda Burk
reviews.review: Submitted an application over 2 weeks ago and so far have not heard back. Called Son-Rise multiple times since then and were told the processing delay was a result of the pandemic and the company being too busy. Given that people have deadlines to move in and out, we found this management company not professional.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Amanda: Thank you for reaching out. We checked our inbox and files and we could not find an application from you.  Please let us know if you submitted an online application through our website.  You may call us at 360-738-3700 or email at info@son-rise.net. All the best, Son-Rise Property Management

reviews.author: Ben Thompson
reviews.review: Everyone at Son-Rise was very friendly and quick to answer questions. Sandra was especially helpful. Another bonus was the online maintenance requests which had extremely fast response time. Couldn't ask for a better experience.

ownerResponse.text: Hey there, Ben. We're happy to hear you had an awesome time with us at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.! Thanks for sharing your experience. We hope you stop by and see us again soon.

reviews.author: Greg Campbell
reviews.review:
Reply to response from the owner:

As a property management group, it would be very simple for you to search your

ownerResponse.text: We greatly appreciate your response; however, we are unable to find a record for you as a past or current tenant or an affiliated vendor. Please contact our office at 360-738-3700 or e-mail us at info@son-rise.net, so we can better  More

reviews.author: Chandler Hines
reviews.review:
Not sure what you have to do to get a call back, left several messages.

Only communication I get is when they want my 44$ every month

reviews.author: Adrienne Martin
reviews.review: Son-Rise is proof that not all property management companies are terrible! Their office staff are professional and kind, and Kandis was absolutely wonderful to work with.

ownerResponse.text: We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one, and that Kandis was able to take care of your needs! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc.

reviews.author: Taylor Ingram
reviews.review: I wish I could give zero stars. Every time I call and politely try to speak to someone, whoever answers is SO incredibly rude. I just moved into an apartment under their management about two months ago and they have made settling in so difficult. I really wish they could be a tad more conscious about how they treat people.

ownerResponse.text: We want to sincerely apologize for your negative experience with us, however, we'd like to learn more about the situation. We want to make things right. Please contact us at (360) 738-3700 and we will get back to you promptly. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.author: Zach Welch
reviews.review: I don't have time to go into how much this company sucks. They treat their tenets like crap. They essentially have long term contracts with big property owners and no accountability because of it. If you have an option, I'm warning you, don't rent from them, or anyone who uses them to manage a property.

reviews.author: Sarah Mccutchen
reviews.review: So Son-rise was on top of every maintenance need we had the short time we were there. Kandis is awesome to work with and met all our needs.

ownerResponse.text: Hello Sarah. We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We're always happy to hear appreciation from our customers. We look forward to seeing you again soon at Son-Rise Property Management, Inc..

reviews.review: My small family had a good experience with Son-Rise. Maintenance was usually prompt, and the employees were always polite and professional.

summary:
# PURE Property Management of Washington: A Balanced Overview

## Good

PURE Property Management of Washington has garnered appreciation for being proactive and responsive in addressing tenant concerns. Several user reviews highlight specific employees by name who have demonstrated professionalism and attentiveness, contributing to positive rental experiences. For instance, one tenant expressed gratitude for the prompt repair of a malfunctioning water heater, stating that the situation was handled quickly, efficiently, and timely. Another tenant reported that their maintenance issues were resolved swiftly, and the property manager was a pleasure to work with.

Moreover, some tenants have had great interactions during the length of their lease with PURE Property Management. One emphasized that their numerous maintenance requests were addressed with speed and professionalism. Others praised the company's efficiency in dealing with the application process, easy-to-use work order systems, and empathetic support during challenging times when rent payments were slightly delayed.

## Great

Compliments towards individual team members are a common theme in user reviews. Tenants frequently describe staff as responsive, helpful, and eager to resolve maintenance concerns, which has fostered trust and long-term tenancies. This engagement is a testament to the property management company's dedication to providing good customer service. Several tenants who signed successive leases expressed their thanks for the understanding and empathy the staff showed them during hard times.

Furthermore, the reviews highlight instances of the PURE Property Management team going above and beyond, such as cleaners clearing out apartments early to help tenants avoid couch surfing, and staff being accommodating towards children when families visit the office. Landlords who opted for PURE Property Management services to handle their rentals have also indicated satisfaction with how the company manages tenant issues, screenings, and maintenance, which eases the burden of property ownership.

## Bad

Despite numerous positive testimonies, PURE Property Management of Washington's user reviews reveal a trend of dissatisfaction among a significant number of tenants and property owners. Common complaints include poor communication, delays in addressing maintenance requests, and a perceived lack of concern for tenants' well-being. One review, for example, described an instance where a seemingly critical application was overlooked, causing frustration over wasted effort and time.

Additional grievances include conflicts over security deposit refunds, with several tenants feeling unfairly charged upon move-out. Instances were noted of tenants spending considerable time and effort to clean properties only to be met with what they consider unjust cleaning fees deducted from their deposits. These examples reflect a broader concern over the perceived lack of fairness and transparency in the company's dealings with its renters.

## Ugly

Certain user reviews point to more severe issues with PURE Property Management of Washington. One alarming review mentions a situation where a resident did not receive prior warning about mold problems, citing ongoing unaddressed mold build-up that caused property damage. From a professional standpoint, there are laments of poor experience both personally and for a property owner encountering legal challenges with the company.

Issues extend to accusations of predatory financial practices, wherein tenants and potential tenants claim that the company demands excessive or unnecessary fees. For example, one prospective tenant describes feeling compelled to pay for additional services like pet profiles without justification. These stories create an image of a property management company that, at its worst, prioritizes profit over tenant and owner satisfaction.

This article is generated by ChatGPT, and the intent is to serve as a balanced review summary of PURE Property Management of Washington based on user reviews. Please note that the specifics mentioned here rely on the sentiment expressed through user reviews and are intended for guidance in finding a suitable property management company or rental property.
